skill_constraints: Severe overload on Frontend dev; Critical bottleneck and key-person dependency on Lead for DirectX.
mitigation_strategies: Significant de-scoping of features or acceptance of timeline slip.

skill_constraints: Reduced key-person dependency by adding a Senior WPF Developer.
resource_bottlenecks: Lead dev during POC remains a focused bottleneck, which is acceptable.
mitigation_strategies: The new developer takes over half the WPF tasks, freeing up the current frontend dev and lead. The Lead can focus on the POC and mentoring.
